typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	pbatch_id as integer (1),
	vDefaultComplete as string ('Complete'),
	vDefaultYes as string ('Yes')
}
source(output(
		RatingHeaderID as integer,
		RatingReferenceNumber as string,
		PremiseTypeID as integer,
		PremiseType as string,
		PremiseID as integer,
		PremiseName as string,
		AssessorID as integer,
		AssessorEmail as string,
		Customer_Name as string,
		Customer_TradingName as string,
		Customer_Mailing_StreeNumber as string,
		Customer_Mailing_StreetName as string,
		Customer_Mailing_Suburb as string,
		Customer_Mailing_Postcode as string,
		Customer_Mailing_State as string,
		RatingPeriodFrom as timestamp,
		RatingPeriodTo as timestamp,
		PublicListingFlag as boolean,
		OfficerID as integer,
		RatingStatusID as integer,
		RatingStatus as string,
		LodgedDate as timestamp,
		PaymentStatusID as integer,
		PaymentStatus as string,
		PaidDate as timestamp,
		CertificateValidFrom as timestamp,
		CertificateValidTo as timestamp,
		PremiseNameOnCert as string,
		CustomerNameOnCert as string,
		Certificate_Customer_Email as string,
		LastActionDate as timestamp,
		ReplaceFlag as boolean,
		RenewFlag as boolean,
		PreviousRatingHeaderID as integer,
		NewRatingHeaderID as integer,
		StreetNumber as string,
		StreetName as string,
		Suburb as string,
		Postcode as string,
		State as string,
		RatingTypes as string,
		CinemaTheatres as decimal(8,2),
		ShoppingCentreWaterSummaryID as integer,
		FloorConfiguration as string,
		ParkingSpacesMechanical as decimal(8,2),
		ParkingSpacesNatural as decimal(8,2),
		TotalGymGLAR as decimal(12,3),
		FoodCourtSeats as decimal(8,2),
		conflictOfInterestFlag as boolean,
		InComplianceWithCurrentRules as boolean,
		WaterStarRatingWRecycle as string,
		WaterStarRatingWoRecycle as string,
		EnergyStarRatingWRecycle as string,
		EnergyStarRatingWoRecycle as string,
		totalEnergyConsumption as decimal(19,4),
		WeeklyCoreHoursOfService as decimal(8,2),
		TotalElectricityConsumption as decimal(12,3),
		TotalDieselConsumption as decimal(12,3),
		WaterConsumption as decimal(12,3),
		RecycleNormalisedWaterConsumption as decimal(12,3),
		TotalWaterConsumption as decimal(12,3),
		TotalRecycledWaterPercent as decimal(6,2),
		TotalGasConsumption as decimal(12,3),
		RatingLodgementFees as decimal(12,2),
		PredictedGreenhouseGasIntensity as decimal(12,3),
		PredictedAverageWaterUse as decimal(12,3),
		NumberOfTradingDays as decimal(8,2),
		NoRecyclePredictedAverageWaterUse as decimal(12,3),
		NoGreenPowerGHGIntensityScope12 as decimal(12,3),
		NoGreenPowerGHGIntensityScope123 as decimal(12,3),
		NoGreenPowerGHGEmissionsScope12 as decimal(12,3),
		NoGreenPowerGHGEmissionsScope123 as decimal(12,3),
		GreenhouseGasIntensityScope123 as decimal(12,3),
		GreenhouseGasEmissionsScope123 as decimal(12,3),
		EnergyIntensity as decimal(12,3),
		ExplainWhyNotCompliant as string,
		IsSmallShoppingCentre as boolean,
		batch_id as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_COMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> getRatings
source(output(
		id as integer,
		salesforce_building_Id as string,
		batch_id as integer,
		created_on as timestamp,
		member_premise_id as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> getLookupSalesforceBuildings
source(output(
		id as integer,
		salesforce_assessor_Id as string,
		batch_id as integer,
		created_on as timestamp,
		member_assessor_id as integer,
		salesforce_company_id as string,
		member_company_id as integer,
		sync_status as string,
		mailing_country as string,
		billing_country as string,
		accredition as string,
		rating_type as string,
		regional_cleaned as string,
		salesforce_contact_type as string,
		salesforce_portal_access as string,
		salesforce_user_active as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> getLookupSalesforceAssessors
source(output(
		id as integer,
		salesforce_user_Id as string,
		member_officer_id as integer,
		batch_id as integer,
		created_on as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> getLookupSalesforceTechOfficer
getRatings filter(equals(batch_id, $pbatch_id)) ~> filterBatchRatings
joinLookupSalesforceAssessors, filterSFBuildingByBatch join(PremiseID == member_premise_id,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> joinLookupSalesforceBuilding
getLookupSalesforceBuildings filter(equals(batch_id,  $pbatch_id)) ~> filterSFBuildingByBatch
derivedFields, filterSFAssessorsByBatch join(AssessorID == member_assessor_id,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> joinLookupSalesforceAssessors
getLookupSalesforceAssessors filter(equals(batch_id,  $pbatch_id)) ~> filterSFAssessorsByBatch
filterBatchRatings derive(D_Rating_Scope = iif(equalsIgnoreCase(PremiseType, 'shopping centre'), 'Not applicable', ''),
		D_Main_Purpose_Of_Rating = iif(equalsIgnoreCase(PremiseName, 'shopping centre'), 'None of the above (NABERS voluntary rating)', ''),
		D_Renew_Replace = iif(!isNull(RenewFlag) || !isNull(ReplaceFlag), 
iif(RenewFlag, 'Renew', iif(ReplaceFlag, 'Replace', '')),''),
		D_Review_Summary_Page = $vDefaultComplete,
		D_Using_Latest_Rules_Water = $vDefaultYes,
		D_Using_Latest_Rules_Energy = $vDefaultYes,
		D_Rating_Information_Page = $vDefaultComplete,
		D_Lodge_Rating_Page = $vDefaultComplete,
		D_Rating_Details_Page = $vDefaultComplete,
		D_Parking_Space_Page = $vDefaultComplete,
		D_HasCinemas = CinemaTheatres > 0,
		D_WaterPageComplete = iif(isNull(ShoppingCentreWaterSummaryID), '', $vDefaultComplete),
		D_HasParkingSpace = ParkingSpacesMechanical + ParkingSpacesNatural > 0,
		D_HasGym = TotalGymGLAR > 0,
		D_HasFoodCourt = FoodCourtSeats > 0,
		D_ConflictOfInterest = iif(isNull(conflictOfInterestFlag) , false(), conflictOfInterestFlag),
		D_CompliantWithCurrentRules = iif(isNull(InComplianceWithCurrentRules) , false(), InComplianceWithCurrentRules),
		D_RelodgedDate = LodgedDate,
		D_RatingDataCompleteFlag = $vDefaultYes,
		D_AssessorDeclaration = $vDefaultYes,
		D_CustomerAwareOfStarRating = $vDefaultYes,
		D_SingleMultiStorey = iif(isNull(FloorConfiguration), 'Single storey', 'Multi-storey')) ~> derivedFields
getLookupSalesforceTechOfficer filter(equals(batch_id, $pbatch_id)) ~> filterSFOfficerByBatch
joinLookupSalesforceBuilding, filterSFOfficerByBatch join(OfficerID == member_officer_id,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> joinLookupSalesforceUsers
joinLookupSalesforceUsers sink(input(
		id as integer,
		source_rating_id as integer,
		building_type as string,
		sf_company_id as string,
		sf_building_id as string,
		batch_id as integer,
		sf_rating_id as string,
		sf_assessor_id as string,
		assessor_email as string,
		customer_email as string,
		cert_building_name as string,
		cert_customer_name as string,
		rating_type as string,
		rating_main_purpose as string,
		has_cinema as boolean,
		period_from as timestamp,
		period_to as timestamp,
		status as string,
		cert_valid_from as timestamp,
		cert_valid_to as timestamp,
		rating_ref_number as string,
		lodged_date as timestamp,
		rating_scope as string,
		publicly_listed as boolean,
		sf_officer_id as string,
		last_update_date as timestamp,
		renew_replace as string,
		sync_status as string,
		review_summary_page as string,
		using_latest_rules as string,
		rating_information_page as string,
		lodge_rating_page as string,
		rating_details_page as string,
		parking_space_page as string,
		water_page as string,
		has_parking_space as string,
		has_gym as string,
		has_food_court as string,
		conflict_of_interest as string,
		compliant_with_current_rules as string,
		relodged_date as timestamp,
		rating_data_complete as string,
		assessor_declaration as string,
		customer_aware_of_star_rating as string,
		water_star_rating_with_recycle as string,
		water_star_rating_without_recycle as string,
		energy_star_rating_with_recycle as string,
		energy_star_rating_without_recycle as string,
		total_energy_consumption as decimal(19,4),
		weekly_core_hours_of_Service as decimal(8,2),
		total_electricity_consumption as decimal(12,3),
		total_diesel_consumption as decimal(12,3),
		water_consumption as decimal(12,3),
		recycle_normalised_water_consumption as decimal(12,3),
		total_water_consumption as decimal(12,3),
		total_recycled_water_percent as decimal(12,3),
		total_gas_consumption as decimal(12,3),
		rating_lodgement_fees as decimal(12,3),
		predicted_greenhouse_gas_intensity as decimal(12,3),
		predicted_average_water_use as decimal(12,3),
		number_of_trading_days as decimal(12,3),
		no_recycle_predicted_average_water_use as decimal(12,3),
		no_greenpower_ghg_intensity_scope_12 as decimal(12,3),
		no_greenpower_ghg_intensity_scope_123 as decimal(12,3),
		no_greenpower_ghg_emissions_scope_12 as decimal(12,3),
		no_greenpower_ghg_emissions_scope_123 as decimal(12,3),
		greenhouse_gas_intensity_scope_123 as decimal(12,3),
		greenhouse_gas_emissions_scope_123 as decimal(12,3),
		energy_intensity as decimal(12,3),
		explain_why_not_compliant as string,
		is_small_shopping_centre as boolean,
		using_latest_rules_water as boolean,
		using_latest_rules_energy as boolean,
		single_or_multi_storey as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		source_rating_id = RatingHeaderID,
		building_type = PremiseType,
		sf_building_id = salesforce_building_Id,
		batch_id = getRatings@batch_id,
		sf_assessor_id = salesforce_assessor_Id,
		assessor_email = AssessorEmail,
		customer_email = Certificate_Customer_Email,
		cert_building_name = PremiseNameOnCert,
		cert_customer_name = CustomerNameOnCert,
		status = RatingStatus,
		period_from = RatingPeriodFrom,
		period_to = RatingPeriodTo,
		cert_valid_from = CertificateValidFrom,
		cert_valid_to = CertificateValidTo,
		has_cinema = D_HasCinemas,
		rating_type = RatingTypes,
		rating_main_purpose = D_Main_Purpose_Of_Rating,
		rating_ref_number = RatingReferenceNumber,
		lodged_date = LodgedDate,
		rating_scope = D_Rating_Scope,
		publicly_listed = PublicListingFlag,
		sf_officer_id = salesforce_user_Id,
		sf_company_id = salesforce_company_id,
		last_update_date = LastActionDate,
		renew_replace = D_Renew_Replace,
		review_summary_page = D_Review_Summary_Page,
		using_latest_rules = D_Using_Latest_Rules_Water,
		rating_information_page = D_Rating_Information_Page,
		lodge_rating_page = D_Lodge_Rating_Page,
		rating_details_page = D_Rating_Details_Page,
		parking_space_page = D_Parking_Space_Page,
		water_page = D_WaterPageComplete,
		has_parking_space = D_HasParkingSpace,
		has_gym = D_HasGym,
		has_food_court = D_HasFoodCourt,
		conflict_of_interest = D_ConflictOfInterest,
		compliant_with_current_rules = D_CompliantWithCurrentRules,
		relodged_date = D_RelodgedDate,
		rating_data_complete = D_RatingDataCompleteFlag,
		assessor_declaration = D_AssessorDeclaration,
		customer_aware_of_star_rating = D_CustomerAwareOfStarRating,
		water_star_rating_with_recycle = WaterStarRatingWRecycle,
		water_star_rating_without_recycle = WaterStarRatingWoRecycle,
		energy_star_rating_with_recycle = EnergyStarRatingWRecycle,
		energy_star_rating_without_recycle = EnergyStarRatingWoRecycle,
		total_energy_consumption = totalEnergyConsumption,
		weekly_core_hours_of_Service = WeeklyCoreHoursOfService,
		total_electricity_consumption = TotalElectricityConsumption,
		total_diesel_consumption = TotalDieselConsumption,
		water_consumption = WaterConsumption,
		recycle_normalised_water_consumption = RecycleNormalisedWaterConsumption,
		total_water_consumption = TotalWaterConsumption,
		total_recycled_water_percent = TotalRecycledWaterPercent,
		total_gas_consumption = TotalGasConsumption,
		rating_lodgement_fees = RatingLodgementFees,
		predicted_greenhouse_gas_intensity = PredictedGreenhouseGasIntensity,
		predicted_average_water_use = PredictedAverageWaterUse,
		no_recycle_predicted_average_water_use = NoRecyclePredictedAverageWaterUse,
		number_of_trading_days = NumberOfTradingDays,
		no_greenpower_ghg_intensity_scope_12 = NoGreenPowerGHGIntensityScope12,
		no_greenpower_ghg_intensity_scope_123 = NoGreenPowerGHGIntensityScope123,
		no_greenpower_ghg_emissions_scope_12 = NoGreenPowerGHGEmissionsScope12,
		no_greenpower_ghg_emissions_scope_123 = NoGreenPowerGHGEmissionsScope123,
		greenhouse_gas_intensity_scope_123 = GreenhouseGasIntensityScope123,
		greenhouse_gas_emissions_scope_123 = GreenhouseGasEmissionsScope123,
		energy_intensity = EnergyIntensity,
		explain_why_not_compliant = ExplainWhyNotCompliant,
		is_small_shopping_centre = IsSmallShoppingCentre,
		single_or_multi_storey = D_SingleMultiStorey,
		using_latest_rules_water = D_Using_Latest_Rules_Water,
		using_latest_rules_energy = D_Using_Latest_Rules_Energy
	),
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> dumpToSFTransofrmedRatings

sqlReaderQuery.value:
Select Top 20
	rh.RatingHeaderID,
	RatingReferenceNumber,
	rh.PremiseTypeID,
	premiseType.ClassName as PremiseType,
	rh.PremiseID,
	premise.PremiseName as PremiseName,
	AssessorID,
	rc.email as AssessorEmail,
	customer.RegisteredName as Customer_Name, 
	customer.TradingName as Customer_TradingName,
	cmaddr.[StreetNumber] as [Customer_Mailing_StreeNumber],
    cmaddr.[StreetName]  as [Customer_Mailing_StreetName],
    cmaddr.[Suburb] as [Customer_Mailing_Suburb],
    cmaddr.[Postcode] as [Customer_Mailing_Postcode],
	cmst.ClassName as [Customer_Mailing_State],

	RatingPeriodFrom,
	RatingPeriodTo,
	PublicListingFlag,
	OfficerID,
	RatingStatusID,
	rs.ClassName as RatingStatus,
	LodgedDate,
	PaymentStatusID,
	ps.ClassName as PaymentStatus,
	PaidDate,
	--Certificate
	CertificateValidFrom,
	CertificateValidTo,

	PremisesName as PremiseNameOnCert,
	CustomerName as CustomerNameOnCert,

	rh.DeliveryEmail  as Certificate_Customer_Email,

	LastActionDate, 

	ReplaceFlag,
	RenewFlag,
	PreviousRatingHeaderID,
	NewRatingHeaderID,
	addr.[StreetNumber],
    addr.[StreetName],
    addr.[Suburb],
    addr.[Postcode],
	st.ClassName as [State],
	(select  stuff(list,1,1,'')
		from  (( Select ';' + cast(crt.ClassName as varchar(16)) FROM tblRatingType rt 
					INNER JOIN tblClassification crt on crt.ClassificationID = rt.RatingType
					and rt.RatingHeaderID = rh.RatingHeaderID
					for     xml path(''))) as Sub(list)) as RatingTypes



	, scs.CinemaTheatres 
	, scws.ShoppingCentreWaterSummaryID 
	, scs.FloorConfiguration
	, scs.ParkingSpacesMechanical
	, scs.ParkingSpacesNatural 
	, scs.TotalGymGLAR 
	, scs.FoodCourtSeats 
	, rad.conflictOfInterestFlag 
	, rad.InComplianceWithCurrentRules 
	, (Select top 1 wsrcl.classname from tblRatingType wsr left join tblClassification wsrcl on wsrcl.ClassificationID = wsr.StarRatingWithGreenPowerID and wsr.RatingHeaderID = rh.RatingHeaderID and wsr.RatingType = 57) as WaterStarRatingWRecycle
	, (Select top 1 wsrcl.classname from tblRatingType wsr left join tblClassification wsrcl on wsrcl.ClassificationID = wsr.StarRatingWithoutGreenPowerID and wsr.RatingHeaderID = rh.RatingHeaderID and wsr.RatingType = 57) as WaterStarRatingWoRecycle
	, (Select top 1 wsrcl.classname from tblRatingType wsr left join tblClassification wsrcl on wsrcl.ClassificationID = wsr.StarRatingWithGreenPowerID and wsr.RatingHeaderID = rh.RatingHeaderID and wsr.RatingType = 56) as EnergyStarRatingWRecycle
	, (Select top 1 wsrcl.classname from tblRatingType wsr left join tblClassification wsrcl on wsrcl.ClassificationID = wsr.StarRatingWithoutGreenPowerID and wsr.RatingHeaderID = rh.RatingHeaderID and wsr.RatingType = 56) as EnergyStarRatingWoRecycle
	, isnull(sces.TotalElectricityUse * 3.6, 0) + isnull(sces.TotalGasUse, 0) + isnull(sces.TotalLPGUse * 25.7, 0) + isnull(sces.TotalOilUse * 38.6, 0) + isnull(sces.TotalCoalUse * 22.1, 0) as totalEnergyConsumption
	, scs.HoursOfService as WeeklyCoreHoursOfService 
	, sces.TotalElectricityUse as TotalElectricityConsumption
	, sces.TotalOilUse as TotalDieselConsumption
	, scws.WaterConsumptionWoRW as WaterConsumption
	, scws.WaterUsePerSqmWoRW as RecycleNormalisedWaterConsumption
	, scws.WaterConsumptionWoRW as TotalWaterConsumption
	, scws.RecycledWaterPercent as TotalRecycledWaterPercent
	, sces.TotalGasUse as TotalGasConsumption
	, (select Amount from tblFinancialTransaction ft inner join tblRatingPayment rp on ft.RatingPaymentID = rp.RatingPaymentID
			and rp.RatingHeaderID = rh.RatingHeaderId
			where FeeCategoryID = 244 -- Loedgement
			) as RatingLodgementFees
	, sces.PredictedGHGEmissionsPerSqm as PredictedGreenhouseGasIntensity
	, scws.PredictedWaterUsePerGLAR as PredictedAverageWaterUse
	, scs.TradingDays as NumberOfTradingDays
	, scws.PredictedWaterUsePerGLARWoRW as NoRecyclePredictedAverageWaterUse
	, sces.GHGEmissionsPerSqmGLARScope12WoGP as NoGreenPower_GHG_IntensityScope_12
	, sces.GHGEmissionsPerSqmGLARScope123WoGP as NoGreenPowerGHGIntensityScope123
	, sces.GHGEmissionsScope12WoGP as NoGreenPowerGHGEmissionsScope12
	, sces.GHGEmissionsScope123WoGP  as NoGreenPowerGHGEmissionsScope123
	, sces.GHGEmissionsPerSqmGLARScope123 as GreenhouseGasIntensityScope123
	, sces.GHGEmissionsScope123  as GreenhouseGasEmissionsScope123
	, sces.EnergyIntensity
	, rad.ComplianceExplanation as ExplainWhyNotCompliant 
	, scs.IsSmallShoppingCentre
	, 1 as batch_id

--into RatingHeaderStage
from tblRatingHeader rh
left join tblPremise premise on premise.PremiseID = rh.PremiseID
left join tblClassification premiseType on premiseType.ClassificationID = rh.PremiseTypeID
left join tblClassification rs on rs.ClassificationID = rh.RatingStatusID
left join tblClassification ps on ps.ClassificationID = rh.PaymentStatusID
left join tblAdministrator ad on ad.AdministratorID = rh.OfficerID
left join tblUser aduser on aduser.UserID = ad.UserID
left join tblCustomer customer on customer.CustomerID = rh.CustomerID
left join tblRatingContractor rc on rc.RatingContractorID = rh.AssessorID
left join tblUser rcuser on rcuser.UserID = rc.UserID
left join tblAddress addr on addr.AddressId = premise.PremiseAddressId
left join tblClassification st on st.ClassificationID = addr.StateId
left join tblAddress cmaddr on cmaddr.AddressId = customer.MailingAddressID
left join tblClassification cmst on cmst.ClassificationID = cmaddr.StateId

left join tblShoppingCentreSummary scs on scs.RatingHeaderID = rh.RatingHeaderID
left join tblShoppingCentreEnergySummary sces on sces.RatingHeaderID = rh.RatingHeaderID
left join tblShoppingCentreWaterSummary scws on scws.RatingHeaderID = rh.RatingHeaderID

left join tblAssessorDeclaration rad on rad.RatingHeaderID = rh.RatingHeaderID

Where rh.PremiseTypeID = @{pipeline().parameters.pPremiseType}
and ((rh.CreatedDate between '@{pipeline().parameters.pStartDate}' and '@{pipeline().parameters.pEndDate}') OR (rh.LastActionDate between '@{pipeline().parameters.pStartDate}' and '@{pipeline().parameters.pEndDate}'))
order by RatingHeaderID

Select Top 20
	rcc.companyid,
	rc.RatingContractorID as AssessorId,
	rcuser.UserID as UserId,
	rcuser.FirstName, 
	rcuser.LastName, 
	tc.ClassName as Title, 
	maddr.[StreetNumber] as Mailing_StreetNumber,
    maddr.[StreetName] as Mailing_StreetName,
    maddr.[Suburb] as Mailing_Suburb,
    maddr.[Postcode] as Mailing_Postcode,
	mst.ClassName as Mailing_State,

	baddr.[StreetNumber] as Billing_StreetNumber,
    baddr.[StreetName] as Billing_StreetName,
    baddr.[Suburb] as Billing_Suburb,
    baddr.[Postcode] as Billing_Postcode,
	bst.ClassName as Billing_State,
	Phone,
	Email,
	JoinedDate,
	AccreditationDate,
	AccreditationExpiryDate,
	AccreditationNumber,
	EnergyFlag, 
	WaterFlag, 
	WasteFlag
	, 1 as batch_id
	, RequireSupervisionSC
	, (select  stuff(list,1,1,'')
		from  (( Select ';' + cast(crst.ClassCode as varchar(16)) FROM tblRatingContractorAvailability  rca 
					INNER JOIN tblClassification crt on crt.ClassificationID = rca.AvailabilityTypeID
					left join tblClassification crst on crst.ClassificationID = rca.StateId
					and rca.RatingContractorID = rc.RatingContractorID and crt.ClassificationID = 459
					for     xml path(''))) as Sub(list)) as Metropolitan
	, (select  stuff(list,1,1,'')
		from  (( Select ';' + cast(crst.ClassCode as varchar(16)) FROM tblRatingContractorAvailability  rca 
					INNER JOIN tblClassification crt on crt.ClassificationID = rca.AvailabilityTypeID
					left join tblClassification crst on crst.ClassificationID = rca.StateId
					and rca.RatingContractorID = rc.RatingContractorID and crt.ClassificationID = 460
					for     xml path(''))) as Sub(list)) as Regional
	, case when RetailFlag is null then 0 else RetailFlag end as RetailFlag 
	, case when HospitalFlag is null then 0 else HospitalFlag end as HospitalFlag 
	, case when HotelFlag is null then 0 else HotelFlag end as HotelFlag 
	, case when OfficeFlag is null then 0 else OfficeFlag end as OfficeFlag 
	, case when ApartmentBuildingFlag is null then 0 else ApartmentBuildingFlag end as ApartmentBuildingFlag 

	--into AssessorsStage
	from 
		tblRatingHeader rh
		left join tblRatingContractor rc on rc.RatingContractorID = rh.AssessorID
		left join tblUser rcuser on rcuser.UserID = rc.UserID
		left join tblClassification tc on tc.ClassificationID = TitleID
		left join tblAddress maddr on maddr.AddressId = MailingAddressID
		left join tblAddress baddr on baddr.AddressId = BillingAddressID
		left join tblClassification mst on mst.ClassificationID = maddr.StateId
		left join tblClassification bst on bst.ClassificationID = baddr.StateId
		inner join tblRatingContractorCompany rcc on rc.RatingContractorID = rcc.assessorid
		
	Where rh.PremiseTypeID = @{pipeline().parameters.pPremiseType} and 
	(EndEffectiveDate is null or EndEffectiveDate > getdate())
and ((rh.CreatedDate between '@{pipeline().parameters.pStartDate}' and '@{pipeline().parameters.pEndDate}') OR (rh.LastActionDate between '@{pipeline().parameters.pStartDate}' and '@{pipeline().parameters.pEndDate}'))
	order by RatingHeaderID

select top 20 
	c.ABN,c.CompanyName, c.CompanyID, c.CompanyStatusID,
	c.CompanyTypeID, c.CompanyURL, c.MailingAddressID, c.Phone, 
	c.PIInsuranceExpiryDate, c.PLInsuranceExpiryDate, c.RatingParticipationFlag,
	c.SAPCustomerNo, c.ShortName, c.SoleTraderFlag,
	maddr.[StreetNumber] as Mailing_StreetNumber,
    maddr.[StreetName] as Mailing_StreetName,
    maddr.[Suburb] as Mailing_Suburb,
    maddr.[Postcode] as Mailing_Postcode,
	mst.ClassName as Mailing_State,

	baddr.[StreetNumber] as Billing_StreetNumber,
    baddr.[StreetName] as Billing_StreetName,
    baddr.[Suburb] as Billing_Suburb,
    baddr.[Postcode] as Billing_Postcode,
	bst.ClassName as Billing_State,
	'Assessor' as Type
	, 1 as batch_id
into CompanyStage
from  
	tblRatingHeader rh
	left join tblRatingContractor rc on rc.RatingContractorID = rh.AssessorID
	inner join tblRatingContractorCompany rcc on rc.RatingContractorID = rcc.assessorid
	inner join tblCompany c on c.companyid = rcc.companyid
	left join tblAddress maddr on maddr.AddressId = c.MailingAddressID
	left join tblAddress baddr on baddr.AddressId = c.BillingAddressID
	left join tblClassification mst on mst.ClassificationID = maddr.StateId
	left join tblClassification bst on bst.ClassificationID = baddr.StateId
Where rh.PremiseTypeID = @{pipeline().parameters.pPremiseType}
	and (EndEffectiveDate is null or EndEffectiveDate > getdate())
and ((rh.CreatedDate between '@{pipeline().parameters.pStartDate}' and '@{pipeline().parameters.pEndDate}') OR (rh.LastActionDate between '@{pipeline().parameters.pStartDate}' and '@{pipeline().parameters.pEndDate}'))
	order by RatingHeaderID

select top 20 
	c.ABN,c.CompanyName, c.CompanyID, c.CompanyStatusID,
	c.CompanyTypeID, c.CompanyURL, c.MailingAddressID, c.Phone, 
	c.PIInsuranceExpiryDate, c.PLInsuranceExpiryDate, c.RatingParticipationFlag,
	c.SAPCustomerNo, c.ShortName, c.SoleTraderFlag,
	maddr.[StreetNumber] as Mailing_StreetNumber,
    maddr.[StreetName] as Mailing_StreetName,
    maddr.[Suburb] as Mailing_Suburb,
    maddr.[Postcode] as Mailing_Postcode,
	mst.ClassName as Mailing_State,

	baddr.[StreetNumber] as Billing_StreetNumber,
    baddr.[StreetName] as Billing_StreetName,
    baddr.[Suburb] as Billing_Suburb,
    baddr.[Postcode] as Billing_Postcode,
	bst.ClassName as Billing_State,
	'Assessor' as Type
	, 1 as batch_id
into CompanyStage
from  
	tblRatingHeader rh
	left join tblRatingContractor rc on rc.RatingContractorID = rh.AssessorID
	inner join tblRatingContractorCompany rcc on rc.RatingContractorID = rcc.assessorid
	inner join tblCompany c on c.companyid = rcc.companyid
	left join tblAddress maddr on maddr.AddressId = c.MailingAddressID
	left join tblAddress baddr on baddr.AddressId = c.BillingAddressID
	left join tblClassification mst on mst.ClassificationID = maddr.StateId
	left join tblClassification bst on bst.ClassificationID = baddr.StateId
Where rh.PremiseTypeID = @{pipeline().parameters.pPremiseType}
	and (EndEffectiveDate is null or EndEffectiveDate > getdate())
and ((rh.CreatedDate between '@{pipeline().parameters.pStartDate}' and '@{pipeline().parameters.pEndDate}') OR (rh.LastActionDate between '@{pipeline().parameters.pStartDate}' and '@{pipeline().parameters.pEndDate}'))
	order by RatingHeaderID

activities.name: Lookup Each Building by Address In Salesforce

query.value:
Select id from NO_Building__c 
where Postcode__c = '@{item().Postcode}'
and State__c = '@{item().State}'
and Suburb__c = '@{item().Suburb}'
and Street_Number__c = '@{item().StreetNumber}'
and Street_Name__c = '@{item().StreetName}'
and Name = '@{item().PremiseName}'

dependsOn.activity: Lookup Each Building by Address In Salesforce

expression.value: @contains(string(activity('Lookup Each Building by Address In Salesforce').output), 'firstRow')

value.value: @activity('Lookup Each Building by Address In Salesforce').output.firstrow.Id

activities.name: Lookup Each Assessor by Email In Salesforce

dependsOn.activity: Get Assessor Details by Assessor ID

query.value:
Select id from Contact
where Email= '@{activity('Get Assessor Details by Assessor ID').output.firstRow.Email}'

dependsOn.activity: Lookup Each Assessor by Email In Salesforce

expression.value: @contains(string(activity('Lookup Each Assessor by Email In Salesforce').output), 'firstRow')

query.value: Select id from RecordType where sObjectType = 'Contact' and DeveloperName = 'NO_Assessor'

value.value: @activity('Lookup Each Assessor by Email In Salesforce').output.firstRow.Id
